title: BELGIAN NATIONAL FINAL 2005
text:
BELGIAN NATIONAL FINAL 2005
BELGIUM
"Le grand soir" - Nuno Resende
"Tonight, I prayed for it, I waited for it, the big night"
The Belgian Final was held on March 20th at the RTBF TV Studios in Brussels, hosted by Jean-Pierre Hautier & Jean-Louis Lahaye. The winner was chosen by televoting.
1 Le grand soir The big night Nuno Resende 50.2% 1st 2 Lost paradise Lost paradise Tiffany Ciely 49.8% 2nd
Nuno Resende previously came 6th in the 2000 Belgian Final as part of the group 'La Teuf'. At the ESC Semi-Final, he was 22nd.
